meanings.definition: A living organism that feeds on organic matter, typically having specialized sense organs and nervous system and able to respond rapidly to stimuli.
meanings.sent1: The zoo is full of animals from all over the world.
meanings.sent2: We saw many different animals at the safari park.
meanings.sent3: The animals in the petting zoo were very friendly and cute.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were bustling with animals of all shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent5: The forest was alive with the sounds of animals moving through the trees.

meanings.definition: A mammal, as opposed to a bird, reptile, fish, or insect.
meanings.sent1: My favorite animals are dogs and cats.
meanings.sent2: The farm had cows, pigs, and other animals.
meanings.sent3: The animals in the barn were noisy and messy.
meanings.sent4: The field was filled with animals grazing peacefully.
meanings.sent5: The zookeeper fed the animals their dinner at the same time every day.
